title: Introducing: Dream Girl
body:
**Dream Girl**, a duo comprised of Connor McCarthy and Jennifer Medina (formerly of [Saes](https://soundcloud.

com/saesmusic)) craft almost euro-trance inspired pop, lifting elements from Grimes’ breakthrough third record Visions. Their most recent offering, _Idyll Visions_ is sugar-sweet, uncompromising and thoroughly addictive; oh and as always with Medina, the visuals are on point. Check out a couple of tracks below.
